entities.name: Professor Binns
entities.description: Professor Binns is introduced as the teacher of the class, described as giving a boring and dull lecture.

entities.name: Hermione Granger
entities.description: Hermione Granger is introduced as a student in Professor Binns' class, who puts up her hand to ask a question.

entities.name: Dean Thomas
entities.description: Dean Thomas is mentioned as sitting in the class and having his mouth hanging open.

relationships.description: Professor Binns teaches Hermione Granger in his class.
Hermione Granger is a student of Professor Binns.
